definition: to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: liu2 dong4 xing4 da4 sha1 mo4

sentences.english: Flow property testing should be part of routine pre-engineering work, he says.
sentences.chinese: 流動性是日常先期工程工作的一部分，他說。

sentences.english: You can by hand small pushes, so that lymph flow more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 可以用手輕輕地推按，使淋巴的流動更順暢。

sentences.english: I say that because it gives tremendous liquidity to the markets.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣說是因爲它給市場帶來的巨大的流動性。

sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.
sentences.chinese: 員工流動賦予科技產業流動性，週轉性和能量。

sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.
sentences.chinese: 員工流動賦予科技產業流動性，週轉性和能量。

sentences.english: Pixilation results from the codec having to deal with the rapid flow of information.
sentences.chinese: 從編解碼器處理後的信息迅速流動模糊了的結果。

sentences.english: Is in the profession or other similar organization's average human resource flow level.
sentences.chinese: 就是所在行業或其他同類組織的平均人才流動水平。

sentences.english: Suitable for packing materials with fine flowability.
sentences.chinese: 適用於流動性好的顆粒料的包裝。

sentences.english: Current liabilities as "0", the quick ratio is how much?
sentences.chinese: 流動負債爲“0”時，速動比率爲多少？

sentences.english: Invest in a dairy farm and you'll have lots of liquid assets.
sentences.chinese: 投資牛奶場，你會有很多流動資產。

sentences.english: Shear flow is one of the significant parts of the rheology of polymer blends.
sentences.chinese: 剪切流動是高分子共混物流變學的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The mobile grocery carts travel through the lanes.
The grid shimmers with " current" or grid flux.
sentences.chinese: 網格以“湧流”或網格流動變化輕輕震顫着。

sentences.english: The Thames flows rather slowly, which is very favourable for water transportation.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河流動得相當慢，十分有利於水路運輸。
蚊子滋生於不流動的池塘裏。

sentences.english: Parallel flow through two extended length elements mounted end to end.
sentences.chinese: 通過兩個平行延伸長度要素流動式端到端的。

definition: to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
